formalpara.title: Figure 15.
formalpara.para: A. DIC image of a wild-type adult hermaphoridite gonad arm showing a single corpse (arrow). B. DIC image of an engulfment defective mutant. Dying cells are indicated by arrow. C and D. Fluorescence images of the Plim-7ced-1::gfp reporter corresponding to A and B, respectively (Claus Schertl and Barbara Conradt).
